data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Vilkamaa, Pekka, Hippa, Heikki, Mohrig, Werner (2012): The genus Ctenosciara Tuomikoski (Diptera, Sciaridae) in New Caledonia, with the description of eight new species. Zootaxa 3255: 37-51, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.280643
